PATIENT_ID: TEST_DVT_PEDS_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-12 18:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-12 18:10:00
Category I trauma activation for 10-year-old female. Struck by auto.
Trauma admission confirmed. Age 10.
Right femur fracture. Long-bone fracture. Admitted for operative fixation.
BP 90/58, HR 130, RR 24, GCS 15.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-02-12 18:30:00
Admitted to PICU. Anticipated prolonged stay.
No documentation of pubertal status or Tanner stage.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-13 10:00:00
Post-operative day 1. Patient recovering.
Bleeding assessment not documented.
DVT risk factor assessment not formally completed.
No orders for chemical prophylaxis documented.
